title: Cosmic Reaver Kassadin Approaches
body: By 'Approaches' do you mean at the beginning of the patch.. or actually 2 weeks later, mere days before the next patch (Looking at you Championship kalista, ironside malphite etc) i just want to know, because i really really want this skin and i don't want to wake up in the morning each and every day for the next 2 weeks rush to the computer to play it and find it isn't available, and be disappointed. There are very few ways to better lose hype than that. :(

replies.body:
> wake up in the morning each and every day for the next 2 weeks rush to the computer to play it 

Do you have a life outside of this game?
Yep but it just so happens that I like to check what's happening on lol while I eat breakfast. It's one of the only times of day I don't have to run around doing uni work.
But it is a rubbish skin, this is supposed to depict the OCE server, other than the southern cross, what else does this skin offer that actually shows we are from OCE?

Wow, firstly the skin is one of the visually best designed skins in the game. (so much for it being rubbish)

and secondly do we really need anything other than the southern cross? its on both flags of the two main oce countries. It is associated with the southern hemisphere (aka us) Its used in many bands here in oce, bnz, bluebird chips etc etc. so yea it is pretty relevant to us. Plus its use in old day navigation to actually locate our countries. 

you could just as easily say that about arctic warfare caitlin, other than her hat what indicates russia? 

Infact the only thing in all of the russian skins that relate them to russia are their hats. So how do you think the russians feel? our smaller countries are symbolised by 5 fireballs burning in the heavens, hundreds of millions of miles across, eternally suspended in the shape of a cross in the middle of the sky that will still exist long after this world has become less than dust. while their region is symbolised by a fluffy hat...

i think we win that one mate, so let's not complain 

be careful what you wish for, maybe riot will listen and give us a fluffy hat instead...
and snow..... and their name relevance...

So if i understand you correctly, people in OCE are complaining that the Southern cross doesn't represent us as a region because it is too generic, and you are saying that having snow in a picture must represent Russia? how generic is that?
using that logic, ashe, braum, trundle, all the freljiord champs must be russian?

also what about 'Northern storm Volibear' 'Arctic warfare Caitlin' 'Bear Cavalry Sejuani' says russia?
The 'North' technically is anything above the equator. The 'Arctic' consists of parts of Alaska, Canada, Finland, Greenland, Iceland, Norway, Russia and Sweden, So 'Arctic warfare' refers to any conflict that happens in specific parts of those countries. 'Bear Cavalry' is a fictional alternative to history, in other words bear riding soldiers never existed in Russia, which brings up the debate of 'can fiction represent a region' if you say yes then why not just use Greybeard Veigar as an NZ skin?

so really... neither snow or their names have relevance...

I'ma let you finish but..
Sejuani had the Russian skin

Bear calvalry Sejuani

Arctic Warfare Caitlin

Northern Storm Volibear

Russia has  3 skins. 

And in any case, bear clavalry sej wears the same hat as the rest of them so you can insert her name into what i have written instead of caitlin if you want.

As far as I know, Caitlyn and Volibear skin were made ages ago before there was even a Russia server. If not Caitlyn, at least Volibear skin (it is his one of his release skins). Bear Calvary Sejuani was made specifically for Russian Server. That's like saying Outback Renekton is an OCE server skin. Don't be a moron.
I didn't say they were for the russian server release? i said they were russian. Outback renekton isn't the OCE server skin release but you're the moron if you don't admit its an Australian skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-11T10:47:56.220+0000)
>
> I didn't say they were for the russian server release? i said they were russian. Outback renekton isn't the OCE server skin release but you're the moron if you don't admit its an Australian skin.

Uhh... you said those two skins are to represent Russia. Outback Renekton is an Australian themed skin, but not made to represent OCE (or Australia) like Cosmic Reaver Kassadin is supposed to. Same with Arctic Warfare Caitlyn and Northern Storm Volibear, not made to represent Russia.

Representing a country happens regardless of wether it was created for that purpose. Outback renekton was created by people outside australia to show what australia is. which means they use characteristics they think represent australia to make that skin, e.g. Crocodile dundee/steve irwin being the stereotypical aussie bloke in the outback. 
every country has its stereotypical view, we see russians as all in furry coats and hats with the red star on their head, but it isn't like that, just like all austalians dont go around in cowboy hats wrestling crocodiles. 

Uncle Ryze wasnt released for the american server but you cant argue it doesn't represent USA

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-11T19:22:44.712+0000)
>
> Representing a country happens regardless of wether it was created for that purpose. Outback renekton was created by people outside australia to show what australia is. which means they use characteristics they think represent australia to make that skin, e.g. Crocodile dundee/steve irwin being the stereotypical aussie bloke in the outback. 
> every country has its stereotypical view, we see russians as all in furry coats and hats with the red star on their head, but it isn't like that, just like all austalians dont go around in cowboy hats wrestling crocodiles. 
> 
> Uncle Ryze wasnt released for the american server but you cant argue it doesn't represent USA

Uncle Ryze is an American themed skin based off Uncle Sam (obviously) and looks like it was released to celebrate the 4th of July.

Outback Renekton is an Austalian Themed skin based off crocodile dundee (obviously) and looks like it was released to celebrate australia day.

whats your point?

also neither skin whether it looks like it or not was released for a special event.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T06:28:46.853+0000)
>
> Outback Renekton is an Austalian Themed skin based off crocodile dundee (obviously) and looks like it was released to celebrate australia day.
> 
> whats your point?
> 
> also neither skin whether it looks like it or not was released for a special event.

It was one of Renekton's release skins.
Exactly, not a special event.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T08:38:00.329+0000)
>
> Exactly, not a special event.

Yes. I never said Outback Renekton was for a special event, so I am not sure what your problem is.
My point was that neither Uncle ryze or Outback renekton were for special events. Yet they both still represent their related countries.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T09:39:55.471+0000)
>
> My point was that neither Uncle ryze or Outback renekton were for special events. Yet they both still represent their related countries.

I never said those two skins were for special events. I only said Uncle Ryze was to celebrate the 4th of July.
But it wasnt tho, in any case we are off tangent, the point of talking about uncle ryze was to show that a skin can represent a region without having to be the server skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PxAZdsoc,comment-id=000200000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T20:56:45.072+0000)
>
> But it wasnt tho, in any case we are off tangent, the point of talking about uncle ryze was to show that a skin can represent a region without having to be the server skin.

"When you fire up the grill and light up the fireworks in celebration of Independence Day this weekend, be sure to make some room at your picnic table for a few fellow patriots: the Minuteman Gangplank, Statue of Karthus, and Uncle Ryze skins are now available! So sound off for liberty as you parade through the Fields of Justice, and head on over to the Store to purchase these three new July 4th skins!"
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=152974

I wasn't playing back around 2010, but that sounds like they were celebrating 4th of July with the skins. Anyway, the point was that Cosmic Reaver Kassadin was made to represent the OCE server. Bear Calvary Sejuani was made for Russia server. When they made the Caitlyn and Volibear skin they weren't "representing", just making a skin. You have made your point that you can grab any skin with a theme related to a country and turn it into a representation. Leprechaun Veigar is now representing the Irish! Awesome! So I see your point and I'm done with this conversation.
I'm keen to see people playing Kassadindins for once :)
He is a great champ! I play him a fair bit, everyone thinks he is weak but the opposite is true haha :P

Haha man i don't understand his kit, He's one of those champs i don't click with like Akali, My missus slays with Akali, i pop in with her and die to scuttlebug. I'm useless with her haha How do you use Kass man?

Yea i know the feeling, i just cant use alkali either,
With Kass just start W and focus completely on farming, use W and Q to last hit minions, and if you know you're gunna take a skillshot to the face then use Q to get a magic shield to protect you a little. Max Q and once you hit 6, R in, press QWE and walk away, just repeat this whenever E is up. (situationally dependent of course) but basically the key is to play safe especially early and just farm, engage only if you know you can come out on top or if your jungler comes, and hold out for late game where your Q and E do 1000 each and your W does 800.
Cool man I'll give him a go today :) hopefully I'm not against a Yasuo or Katarina main Haha :p

Sweet as! good luck! :)
if you're against a kat try to fire your Q while her Q knife is in mid air or as she throws it, so that your shield blocks the damage.
This and all your comments had me laughing for an hour aha.
Glad to be of service

If i refer you to http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/cosmic-reaver-kassadin/ this post by riot, it states.
"Cosmic Reaver Kassadin will Riftwalk into the store during Patch 5.20."
One can only assume this means with patch 5.20 the skin will be released. :)

Its the 'during' part that worries me..
championship kalista was 'during' patch 5.18.. or in other words 2 days before 5.19
